newsitem.title: USA: U.S. soymeal weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.
newsitem.headline: U.S. soymeal weekly export sales highlights -- USDA.

text.p: USDA soymeal export sales highlights in latest reporting week:
Net sales of 62,400 MT were off 38 percent from the previous week and 40 percent from the 4-week average.

Major increases for Germany (31,700 MT, includes 36,000 in destination changes, and 4,300 in cancellations), Egypt (25,000 MT), Ireland (15,500 MT, all in destination changes), the United Kingdom (12,500 MT), and Saudi Arabia (10,000 MT) were partially offset by reductions for unknown destinations (51,800 MT). Exports of 104,300 MT fell 36 percent below the previous week and 29 percent below the 4-week average. Germany (31,700 MT), Ireland (15,500 MT), Colombia (13,400 MT), and Saudi Arabia (10,000 MT) were the major recipients.
